metadata.title: CVE-2024-27626 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been identified inDotclear version 2.29. The flaw exists within the Search functionality ofthe Admin Panel.

criterions.comment: dotclear package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
